events.message: The insured reported a vehicle collision involving their car on the highway that occurred yesterday afternoon.
Claim has been categorised under auto accident following the initial review of the accident details submitted.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the claim and will be the primary contact for the insured.
Confirmation sent to the client acknowledging receipt of the claim and outlining next steps in the process.
Request issued for additional documentation including photos of the damaged vehicle and police report.
The insured has submitted all required documents including detailed photos and official accident report.
Investigation into the cause and extent of damage to the vehicle has begun with an assigned claims adjuster.
Investigation team has completed their assessment and report confirming the damage and liability status.
A settlement offer based on the damage assessment and policy terms has been forwarded to the insured.
The insured has replied gratefully accepting the settlement offer and complimenting the claims process.
Claim approved for the settlement amount agreed upon; preparations for payment disbursement initiated.
Settlement payment issued to the insured's bank account as per the approved claim settlement terms.
The claim has been officially closed following successful payment issuance and confirmation from claimant.
All claim related documents and communications have been archived for record-keeping and future reference.
